title: Is there a way to identify public access easements to the cape fear river?  Specifically in the Fayetteville area.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question, although as we focus on Brunswick, New Hanover and Pender counties, it is not specific to Fayetteville:



http://www.myreporter.com/2017/03/is-there-a-way-to-identify-public-access-easements-to-the-cape-fear-river/
